imdb.plot outline: Happyland is name of a happy city with happy people. this city have textile factory. They produce for 2 kids ,Vaio and Vaiona magical dresses. Vaio and Vaiona fight with Dr.Taxiderman , Dr.Taxiderman want steal happy from this city and be owner of this city.
imdb.title: HappyLand
plot: Happyland is name of a happy city with happy people. this city have textile factory. They produce for 2 kids ,Vaio and Vaiona magical dresses. Vaio and Vaiona fight with Dr.Taxiderman , Dr.Taxiderman want steal happy from this city and be owner of this city.::Ramin Karami
